subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Vendee Globe Challenge
lead_paragraph: Without having sailed together before, Ryan Breymaier and Pepe Ribes crossed the Atlantic in June in one of five boats competing in a race from New York to Barcelona.
snippet: Without having sailed together before, Ryan Breymaier and Pepe Ribes crossed the Atlantic in June in one of five boats competing in a race from New York to Barcelona.
